meanings.definition: The state or quality of being similar or alike.
meanings.sent1: The alikeness between the twins was striking.
meanings.sent2: There was an undeniable alikeness between the two paintings.
meanings.sent3: The alikeness in their taste in music made them instant friends.
meanings.sent4: The alikeness in their personalities was like looking in a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The alikeness in their voices made it hard to tell them apart.

meanings.sent1: The alikeness between the siblings was uncanny.
meanings.sent2: There was a clear alikeness between the two actors.
meanings.sent3: The alikeness in their mannerisms always made people do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: The alikeness in their expressions spoke volumes.
meanings.sent5: The alikeness in their laughter echoed through the room.
